caption: This episode showcases how the detective and his partner solve an art forgery case and identify the culprit. The death of an amateur astronomer triggers the detective and his partner's investigation, leading them to uncover a vast network of vagabonds. Highlights include: the detective and his partner discover the murder of an astronomer; they uncover a vast vagabond network; they identify a forged famous painting; the detective attempts to prove the painting is a forgery; eventually, they pinpoint the culprit, a child; this child is destined to die; the detective is determined to prove the painting's forgery; in the end, he succeeds; the detective and his partner solve the forgery case; this investigation enlightens the detective and his partner about the value of vagabonds.
